job description:
• Analyzes current operational functions and offers and implements improvements.
  • Maintains databases and extracts data for analysis.
  • Runs and reviews reports, analyzing results in support of operational functions.
\n\n
  • Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Business, Health Care, or other related field, OR
  • A two-year degree in Computer Science, Business or a related field and two years of reporting and data analysis work experience, OR four years of reporting and data analysis experience.
\n\n\n\n
  • Good organizational, customer service, communications and analytical skills.
  • Ability to use complex mathematical calculations and understand mathematical and statistical concepts.
  • Knowledge of relevant computer support systems.
  • Microsoft Office skills.
  • Ability to acquire programming skills across various software platforms.
